# wcs-button

What if we add some documentation.

I mean will it even blend ?

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                                                                             | Type                                                       |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- |
| `color`    | `color`    | Specify the button color.                                                                                               | `string`                                                   |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Specify wether the button is disabled or not.                                                                           | `boolean`                                                  |
| `href`     | `href`     | Set a URL to point to. If specified use a `a` tag instead of `btn`.                                                     | `string`                                                   |
| `mode`     | `mode`     | This attribute specifies the size of the button. Setting this attribute will change the height and padding of a button. | `"block" \| "icon-only" \| "normal" \| "round" \| "small"` |
| `ripple`   | `ripple`   | Specify wether the button should have a ripple effect or not.                                                           | `boolean`                                                  |
| `type`     | `type`     | Specify the button type.                                                                                                | `"button" \| "submit"`                                     |
